title: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: Dialog details
description: Bug 9654: Modify Parameters: In the dialog, there are a few issues that need addressing: i. duplicated name validation could be performed on the first page ii. the first and second column could be merged
OB: a. The buttons in the dialog are too small. b. When the dialog comes up, no table entry is selected. However, both move buttons are enabled. c. When changing a parameter name to something very long, the preview is cut off. d. The dialog comes up very large for methods with many parameters.
EB: The buttons in the dialog should be larger. When the dialog comes up, a table entry should be selected. Only the move buttons relevant to the selected table entry should be enabled. The preview should display the full parameter name without getting cut off. The dialog size should adjust properly for methods with many parameters.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the parameter modification dialog. 2. Try changing the name of a parameter to something very long. 3. Observe that the preview of the parameter name is cut off.
